ci_support_linux_64_python3.10.____cpyth:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '14'
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
libboost_devel:
- '1.88'
ncurses:
- '6'
numpy:
- '2'
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.10.* *_cpython
python_impl:
- cpython
target_platform:
- linux-64
uhd:
- 4.8.0
zip_keys:
- - c_compiler_version
  - cxx_compiler_version

about.description:
UHD is the free & open-source software driver and API for the Universal
Software Radio Peripheral (USRP(TM)) SDR platform, created and sold by
Ettus Research. UHD supports all Ettus Research USRP(TM) hardware,
including all motherboards and daughterboards, and the combinations thereof.
about.summary: Software driver and API for the Ettus Research USRP SDR platform

commands: uhd_cal_rx_iq_balance --help || ec=$?; if [ $ec -gt 1 ]; then exit $ec; fi
uhd_cal_tx_dc_offset --help || ec=$?; if [ $ec -gt 1 ]; then exit $ec; fi
uhd_cal_tx_iq_balance --help || ec=$?; if [ $ec -gt 1 ]; then exit $ec; fi
uhd_config_info --help || ec=$?; if [ $ec -gt 1 ]; then exit $ec; fi
uhd_find_devices --help || ec=$?; if [ $ec -gt 1 ]; then exit $ec; fi
uhd_image_loader --help || ec=$?; if [ $ec -gt 1 ]; then exit $ec; fi
uhd_images_downloader --help || ec=$?; if [ $ec -gt 1 ]; then exit $ec; fi
uhd_usrp_probe --help || ec=$?; if [ $ec -gt 1 ]; then exit $ec; fi
rfnoc_image_builder --help || ec=$?; if [ $ec -gt 1 ]; then exit $ec; fi
rfnoc_modtool --help || ec=$?; if [ $ec -gt 1 ]; then exit $ec; fi
usrpctl --help || ec=$?; if [ $ec -gt 1 ]; then exit $ec; fi
uhd_convert_cal_data --help || ec=$?; if [ $ec -gt 1 ]; then exit $ec; fi
uhd_power_cal --help || ec=$?; if [ $ec -gt 1 ]; then exit $ec; fi
usrp2_card_burner --help || ec=$?; if [ $ec -gt 1 ]; then exit $ec; fi
test -f $PREFIX/lib/libuhd${SHLIB_EXT}
uhd_config_info --print-all
uhd_find_devices || (($? < 128))

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set uhd_lib = "uhd" %}
{% set version = "4.9.0.1" %}

package:
  name: uhd
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/EttusResearch/uhd/archive/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 0be26a139f23041c1fb6e9666d84cba839460e3c756057dc48dc067cc356a7bc
  patches:
    - 0001-usrp2-Include-DSP-bit-gain-derived-from-peak-stream-.patch
    - 0002-python-Fix-libpyuhd-install_name-on-macOS.patch
    - 0003-cmake-Make-libuhd-linking-to-Python-library-PRIVATE.patch
    - 0004-cmake-Don-t-set-package_dir-in-setup.py.in.patch
    - 0005-cmake-Prefer-python-config-extension-suffix-to-hard-.patch
    - 0006-lib-types-Declare-types-used-with-digital_filter_-ba.patch
    - 0007-cmake-Remove-dynamic_lookup-flat_namespace-linker-fl.patch
    - 0008-utils-rfnoc_modtool-Add-main-function-so-it-can-be-a.patch
    - 0009-Add-option-to-control-building-a-Python-wheel.patch
    - 0010-Adjust-pyproject.toml-to-be-looser-on-Python-version.patch

build:
  number: 1
  run_exports:
    - {{ pin_subpackage('uhd', min_pin='x.x.x', max_pin='x.x.x') }}
  entry_points:
    - rfnoc_image_builder = uhd.rfnoc_image_builder_cmd:main  # [win]
    - rfnoc_modtool = uhd.rfnoc_modtool_cmd:main  # [win]
    - uhd_convert_cal_data = uhd.utils.convert_cal_data:main
    - uhd_images_downloader = uhd.uhd_images_downloader_cmd:main  # [not linux]
    - uhd_power_cal = uhd.utils.uhd_power_cal:main
    - usrpctl = uhd.usrpctl_script_cmd:main  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - python                                 # [build_platform != target_platform]
    - cross-python_{{ target_platform }}     # [build_platform != target_platform]
    - pybind11                               # [build_platform != target_platform]
    - numpy                                  # [build_platform != target_platform]
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - {{ stdlib("c") }}
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - cmake >=3.5.1
    - ninja
    - pkg-config

  host:
    - libboost-devel
    - libusb
    - mako >=0.5.0
    - ncurses  # [not win]
    - numpy
    - pip  # [win]
    - poetry  # [win]
    - pybind11
    - python
    - requests
    - ruamel.yaml
    - setuptools

  run:
    - mako >=0.5.0
    - ncurses  # [not win]
    - python
    - pyyaml
    - requests
    - ruamel.yaml

test:
  commands:
    # verify CLI tools
    {% set cmds = ["uhd_cal_rx_iq_balance", "uhd_cal_tx_dc_offset"] %}
    {% set cmds = cmds + ["uhd_cal_tx_iq_balance", "uhd_config_info"] %}
    {% set cmds = cmds + ["uhd_find_devices", "uhd_image_loader"] %}
    {% set cmds = cmds + ["uhd_images_downloader", "uhd_usrp_probe"] %}
    {% set cmds = cmds + ["rfnoc_image_builder", "rfnoc_modtool", "usrpctl"] %}
    {% set cmds = cmds + ["uhd_convert_cal_data", "uhd_power_cal"] %}
    {% set cmds = cmds + ["usrp2_card_burner"] %}  # [linux]
    {% for cmd in cmds %}
    - {{ cmd }} --help || ec=$?; if [ $ec -gt 1 ]; then exit $ec; fi  # [not win]
    - {{ cmd }} --help || if !ERRORLEVEL! LEQ 1 cmd /c "exit /b 0"  # [win]
    {% endfor %}

    # verify libraries
    - test -f $PREFIX/lib/libuhd${SHLIB_EXT}  # [not win]
    - if not exist %PREFIX%\\Library\\bin\\uhd.dll exit 1  # [win]
    - if not exist %PREFIX%\\Library\\lib\\uhd.lib exit 1  # [win]

    # run select commands
    - uhd_config_info --print-all
    - uhd_find_devices || (($? < 128))  # [unix]

  imports:
    - uhd

about:
  home: httsp://github.com/EttusResearch/uhd
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: host/LICENSE
  summary: Software driver and API for the Ettus Research USRP SDR platform
  description: |
    UHD is the free & open-source software driver and API for the Universal
    Software Radio Peripheral (USRP(TM)) SDR platform, created and sold by
    Ettus Research. UHD supports all Ettus Research USRP(TM) hardware,
    including all motherboards and daughterboards, and the combinations thereof.
  doc_url: https://files.ettus.com/manual/
  dev_url: https://github.com/EttusResearch/uhd

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - ryanvolz
